TopicTitle: Part popup in research window disables scrolling

Articles.Content:
KSP Version:

0.90 Windows x32 from Steam running on Windows 8.1 x64

What Happens:

When the popup displaying the properties of a part in the research window is shown it completeley disables the mouse scroll function. Moving the mouse so, that the popup isn't shown anymore will not re-enable the scroll function again.

Selecting another research node enables scrolling again (until the next part popup is displayed).

Steps to Replicate:

1. Load up a save or create an new science or career game.

2. Play until a research node appears which has so many parts that scrolling is enabled.

3. Select this research node.

4. Move the mouse over the part list.

5. Use the mouse scroll wheel to scroll the part list. While doing so, a part icon will move under the mouse cursor.

The part popup will display. Mouse scroll will be disabled in this moment.

7. Select another research node.

8. Select the former research node.

Repeat steps 4 and 5. Same result.

Workaround:

The function of the scroll bar is not affected. It will continue to work, so there's at least one method to scroll the list.
